name: JKHT
description:
[Disclaimer: Does not include kanji, That would takes forever to add in.]

Includes Hiragana, Katakana and Combonations of both!

Learn the Japanese Hiragana and Katakana in this game by memorizing the characters!

Just click play choose which one you want to learn(Or all!) and start playing!

 

This is a screenshot of the Japanese text you can select from in game.Choose from a Quick game, Long game or Unlimited! This is a screen shot of the gamemodes in game(with Quick game selected.

Once you click "Start" it will bring you to the 3 buttons and some Text

This is a screenshot of the main game.

When you have guessed a certain amount of times (Depends on which gamemode you chose.)

This is a screenshot of what you see when you complete a Long game.

This game also has settings!

Thank you for playing my game!
